events.job: Front End engineer working on Heartflow’s medical platforms and tools to detect Coronary Artery diseases.
Graduated from a Master’s Degree in Computer Science specialization Web and Mobile development.

events.company-description: Online poker and sport bettings company
events.job: Internship focused on the development from scratch of a newly mobile app to follow live events programs for poker players present upon the Winamax Tournaments.
Internship centered around full stack technologies with new tools and features implementations for the Clubvivre customer and internal platforms.
